review: Dr. Prakash Jain is a very friendly doctor who explained my dental issue very nicely. He has a very soft hand  which probably is the reason for giving painless treatment. He made me feel very comfortable and beat part is the waiting time is negligible.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have had a long history of dental problems, and many times I have faced gruelling pain in the middle of the night. Dr Prakash Jain has always been my saviour in this painful hours. The various treatments offered at Dr Prakash Jain‚Äôs clinic are always very apt, reasonably priced and hassle free. Our family  members are his patients since more than 20 years. My father had his complete dental rebuilding done by Dr Prakash Jain. And also my daughter is getting her aesthetic dental treatment at his clinic.
